title: Strong induction over upper sets of integers

blocks.name: uzsinds
blocks.content: Strong (or "total") induction principle over an upper set of integers. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm uzsinds(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wi(wral(s1, co(c1, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), w2), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  wfis3(s0, s1, c0, cfv(cuz, c1), clt, w0, w1, w2)
  ltweuz(c1)
  ax-mp(wse(clt, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cfv(cuz, c1), universe))
  fvex(cuz, c1)
  exse(cfv(cuz, c1), universe, clt)
  sylbid(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wral(s1, cpred(clt, cfv(cuz, c1), cv(s0)), w2), w1, wral(s1, co(c1, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), w2))
  raleqdv(s1, cpred(clt, cfv(cuz, c1), cv(s0)), co(c1, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)), w2)
  preduz(cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c1)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cpred.s(s1, clt, cfv(cuz, c1), cv(s0))
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cuz, c1)
  diff.cuz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1))
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cmin, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

thm uzsinds(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {

  âŠ£ (s0 = s1 â†’(w1 â†” w2))
  âŠ£ (s0 = c0 â†’(w1 â†” w0))
  âŠ£ (s0 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` c1)â†’(âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ(c1[...](s0[-]1)), w2)â†’ w1))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)

  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c1)

} = {

  ax-mp(<[Se](â„¤â‰¥ ` c1), (â„¤â‰¥ ` c1)âˆˆ ð•Œ)
  fvex(cuz, c1)

  sylbid(s0 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` c1), âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ Pred(<,(â„¤â‰¥ ` c1), s0), w2), w1, âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ(c1[...](s0[-]1)), w2))
  raleqdv(s1, Pred(<,(â„¤â‰¥ ` c1), s0), (c1[...](s0[-]1)), s0 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` c1), w2)
  preduz(s0, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c1)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.cpred.s(s1, clt, (â„¤â‰¥ ` c1), s0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cuz, c1)
  diff.cuz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, cfz, (s0[-]1))
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: nnsinds
blocks.content: Strong (or "total") induction principle over the naturals. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnsinds(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wi(wral(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), w2), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn), w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  elnnuz(c0)
  uzsinds(s0, s1, c0, nat1, w0, w1, w2)
  sylbir(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat1)), wi(wral(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), w2), w1), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  elnnuz(cv(s0))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:

  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 âˆˆ â„•, w0, c0 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` 1))
  elnnuz(c0)
  uzsinds(s0, s1, c0, nat1, w0, w1, w2)
  sylbir(s0 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` 1), (âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ(1[...](s0[-]1)), w2)â†’ w1), s0 âˆˆ â„•)
  elnnuz(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: nn0sinds
blocks.content: Strong (or "total") induction principle over the nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0sinds(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), w0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wi(wral(s1, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), w2), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn0), w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat0)))
  elnn0uz(c0)
  uzsinds(s0, s1, c0, nat0, w0, w1, w2)
  sylbir(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat0)), wi(wral(s1, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), w2), w1), wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  elnn0uz(cv(s0))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}

  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 âˆˆ â„•0, w0, c0 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` 0))
  elnn0uz(c0)
  uzsinds(s0, s1, c0, nat0, w0, w1, w2)
  sylbir(s0 âˆˆ(â„¤â‰¥ ` 0), (âˆ€(s1 âˆˆ(0[...](s0[-]1)), w2)â†’ w1), s0 âˆˆ â„•0)
  elnn0uz(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}
